subject: Blacks
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: When Skinner was the coach at Vanderbilt University, he recruited Perry Wallace, a high school star in Nashville and the first black athlete to play varsity basketball.
snippet: When Skinner was the coach at Vanderbilt University, he recruited Perry Wallace, a high school star in Nashville and the first black athlete to play varsity basketball.
